attributes.comment:
*N-600 fee will go from $255 to $420
*I-600A Petition to Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative fee will go from $545
to $670
*N-565 Application for Replacement of Certificate of Citizenship (used for name
changes) will go from $220 to$380
*Biometric Services (fingerprints) will go from $70 per person to $80 per person

Dear Sir/Madam,
We are requesting that you do NOT increase these fees for adopting families for:
forms N-600, I600A, and Biometric Services.

Our expenses are already very high to rescue a child from a difficult future.
Please do not burden families with a heart to help children join their family, by
increasing these fees. We pay so many other expenses, including travel costs to
go to retreive our children.

I ask you to be merciful to us and see if we can find your budget needs from some
other form that does not penalize current Americans.

Thank you,
D.C. Tardy

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Don Tardy
